title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

jobcards-id.description: This is a system generated id(s) that is used to restrict access to jobcards micro-service data. This is the source table primary key field value.
jobcards-id.title: The jobcards-id schema

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

notes-type.description: This is the type of note.
notes-type.title: The notes-type schema

notes-note.description: This is the note either TEXT or JSON string.
notes-note.title: The notes-note schema

syntax-type.description: The note format JSON|TEXT. Default is TEXT.
syntax-type.title: The syntax-type schema
